episodes.title: Superior Universal Alignment | Brazil’s Most Disturbing UFO Cult
episodes.description:
A cult leader in Brazil claimed aliens would soon arrive to “cleanse” the world — but only those born after 1981 were worthy of salvation. What followed was a wave of missing children, brutal crimes, and one of the most disturbing cases in Brazilian history.

In this video, we uncover the dark story of the Superior Universal Alignment cult, its leader, and the horrifying aftermath of their beliefs.

⚠️ Disclaimer: All visuals in this video are AI-generated and do not represent real people. This video is for educational and documentary purposes only. If you want to know more about the case, please conduct proper research using reliable sources.

🔔 Subscribe for more deep dives into the world’s most terrifying cults, true crime, and paranormal mysteries.

👇 Question for viewers: Do you think cult leaders truly believe their visions, or use them as control?


Welcome to The Mystery. We post real horror, true crime, and folklore Shorts daily. 

This video was created with the assistance of AI for storytelling purposes. No disrespect is intended toward any real people or cases featured.

Subscribe for more: @TheMystery.33
